newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia to issue T-bill auction results in 30 min. [CORRECTED 14:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Russia to issue T-bill auction results in 30 min. [CORRECTED 14:50 GMT]

text.p: Russia's central bank will announce the delayed results of today's Treasury bill auction in half an hour, Konstantin Korishchenko, director of the open market operations deaprtment, said on Wednesday.
Auction results are normally released at around 1600 local time (1200 GMT).
The delay was caused by technical problems, he told Reuters.
(Corrects to make clear the delay was not due to technical problems in the trading system operated by the Moscow Interbank Currency Exchange).
The finance ministry offered 10.00 trillion roubles of six-month bills in the auction.
